Waɗannan kushen akan wanna shirin shiririta ne. Mutane ya kamata su cire son ran su da ra'ayoyin su wajen yin bitar wasan kwaikwayo. Sannan waƴanda suka ƙasƙantar da kansu wajen kiran mai bayar da umarnin da "maƙaryaci,"  suna tutiyar banza wai "wannan bai taɓa faruwa ba" shima abin takaici ne; wannan wasan kwaikwayo ne, an ƙirƙire shi ne ya nishaɗantar sannan ko kuma ya ilmantar. Waye ya damu da cewa da gaske ne ko kuma ƙirƙira ne? Mutanen da suke mita daga ganin alama suna yarda da shirin "Pearl Harbor" mafi yawancin shi ya faru da gaske. Sannan abubuwan da aka tsara a cikin shirin, (abun da yake da mahimmanci), "Noma" abu ne mai kyau, tsararren abu ne mai kama da alawa, abin da kamar shaguɓe ne duba ga munanan ɗauka dake cikin wannan shiri mai wahalar shiryawa. Kate Beckinsale ta yi wasa kamar da gaske a matsayin ƴar London mai maganar Cockney wadda ta kawo ƙarin ƙudi cikin gidan ta tarbiyyar yara ƴan asalin Nigeria wanda iyayen yaran suka bar mata a yayi da basu da halin tarbiyyantar dasu. A yayin girman su a cikin fararen fata, inda kusan kowa yana da ɗabi'ar wariyar launin fata, sannan wasu lokutan suke da tsananin nuna wariyar launin fata ga duk mutumin da fatar sa tayi kama da ta ɗan saurayin Enitan, ɗan Nigeria, ya shigo cikin baƙuwar duniyar nan inda ya fita daban da kowa. Wannan shiri ne aka sanin kai, da kuma yadda kewaye da kuma tarbiyya suke tasiri wajen yadda muke zama, da yadda zukatan mu suke aiki. Dan haka duka da cewa Enitan baƙi ne, ya taso yadda sa'anin sa suke, yana jin haushin masu baƙar fata. Madalla da wannan shiri wanda babu kamar sa..DAGA ƘARSHE anyi wani abu daban. Lokacin da Enitan ya shige cikin ƴan dabar ƙwalkwabo da suke azabtar da shi, abubuwa lallai sun tsananta. Ya kira kan sa da suna Andy sannan ya aske gashin sa da yake basu haushi, duk dan yana tsananin son ya sage da su, duk da sun tsane shi sannan suna zagin shi ba ƙaƙƙautawa. Shiri akan al'ada ta ƙwalkwabo basu suna ƙaranci, ta yiwu a samu ɗaya a cikin shekaru 10 ko misalin haka. Wannan ya yi fice a cikin mafiya kyawawan su, harda "This is England," "Romper Stomper," sannan yayi shige da "Made in Britain" da Tim Roth. Sannan wasan kwaikwayon "Farming," ya cancanci a yaba masa  dan kowa ya yi wasa kamar da gaske. John Dagleish ya bayar wasa mai matuƙar nishaɗantarwa a matsayin 'Levi,' shugaban ƴan dabar ƙwalkwabo, sannan fitowar Damson Idris a matsayin wanda aka ƙuntatawa, Enitan mai tsanar kan sa ya yi jarunta kuma yayi ƙoƙari. Wannan shiri yana da alamun shiga cikin manyan wasannin kwaikwayo a yayin da yake samun masu kallo da suka dace. Ƙasƙantattun masu bayar da tauraro 1 a bitar shirin sun tabbatar da cewa shirin baiyi dacen masu kallo ba. Sai dai, "Blade Runner" ma bai ƙayatar ba a farkon fitowar sa, dan haka lokaci ne kawai zai nuna. Na bayarda da kyakkyawar shaida ga shirin "Farming" ga dukkan masu kallo da basu damu da shiri mai tsoratarwa ba, sannan ga duk wanda suke son al'adar ƙwalkwabo ta shekarun alif ɗari da saba'in zuwa tamanin. Kamar "The Krays" da kuma "Legend," abin farin ciki shima wannan ƙirƙirar Birtaniya ne, dan haka bai yi rashin basirar, ƙaryar ɗa'a da kuma shirman da masana'antar Nollywood take ganin dole sai ta saka a wasannin kwaikwayon ta ba.
